name: plentifully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in large amounts, or in a way that shows there is a lot of something available: Oil flowed plentifully in the 1970s and '80s. The snow fell less plentifully, but it became intensely cold. See
plentiful
More examplesFewer examplesWater gushes plentifully from the taps.The tears flowed so plentifully that Maggie saw nothing around her for the next ten minutes.The bar was against the far wall, plentifully stocked.
